channel.title: [317] Two Questions [317]
channel.description:
1st question: I have made a shop called Pk Point Shop in shops.cfg. How can I change the prices of the items to Pk points instead of coins.
[s]2nd Question: How can I change the items a new character starts with (i.e. runes, arrows, iron scim, etc.)[/s] [EDIT] Fixed question 2
Thanks

item.title: [317] Two Questions [317]
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

For the second question just search either starter items or search the ids for the items you start with in client.java and you should be able to find them. If its a starter command just search starter

Read full topic
